name: Do They Know
description:
DESCRIPTION:

A simple search for firewood leads young Hollis to something that was never meant to be found...

INPUT (Tank control set-up, gamepad supported):

  • Interact/Pick Up/Talk/Confirm - - Keyboard SPACE BAR - - Gamepad BOTTOM FACE BUTTON (A on Xbox)
  • Inventory - - Keyboard LEFT SHIFT or TAB - - RIGHT FACE BUTTON (B on XBOX)
  • Walk Forwards - - Keyboard W - - Gamepad D-PAD UP
  • Walk Backwards - - Keyboard S - - Gamepad D-PAD DOWN
  • Spin Right - - Keyboard E, Gamepad D-PAD RIGHT
  • Spin Left - - Keyboard Q, Gamepad D-PAD LEFT
  • Sidestep Right - - Keyboard D - - Gamepad SHOULDER BUMPER RIGHT
  • Sidestep Left - - Keyboard A - - Gamepad SHOULDER BUMPER LEFT
  • Look Up - - Keyboard X or R - - Gamepad TRIGGER LEFT
  • Look Down - - Keyboard Z or F - - Gamepad TRIGGER RIGHT
  • Center Camera - - Keyboard C - - Gamepad TOP FACE BUTTON (Y on Xbox)
  • Fast Quit - - Keyboard ESC

CREDITS:

  • Kevin Culler: (a.k.a. "Frank Donovan"/HorseGuy): Programming & Development
  • StageFryte (a.k.a. "STAHP"): Concepts & Character Rendering
  • EldritchRenaissanceCake: QA, Sound Design & Music
  • Skye: Dialogue & Characterisation
  • Mirna Chapra (a.k.a. "hoisamuro"): UI & Ambience (below)
  • George Cheal (a.k.a. "The Bonsai Treehouse"): Lead Direction & Art Design

AMBIENT MUSIC by Mirna Chapra aka 'A WARM PLACE'

SPECIAL THANKS:

  • BanzaiBonsai: Late build feedback and overall support
  • 8-bit Dinosaur: Store page artwork (with permission)
  • Lilith Walther: (a.k.a. "b0tster") Old tech tips posted on the Unreal Engine forums

  • 8-Bit Limit Font by aenigma https://blogfonts.com/8-bit-limit.font
  • Enchanted Sword Font by jeti https://www.dafont.com/enchantedsword.font
